CHAT.comment: JEANNE WOODFORD, WARDEN, Petitioner v. ROBERT FREDERICK GARCEAU.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JANIS S. McLEAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LYNNE S. COFFIN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JANIS S. McLEAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:02 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
